title: Neural Network Visualization
description: Interactive visualization of neural network architectures and learning processes

details.objective: Create an interactive visualization tool for understanding neural network architectures and learning processes
details.approach: Used D3.js for visualization with Vue.js frontend and TensorFlow.js for lightweight neural network simulations
details.outcomes: Developed a tool that helps students visualize backpropagation and gradient descent in real-time
details.learnings: Improved understanding of both neural network concepts and advanced D3.js visualization techniques

title: Cyberpunk Interface Generator
description: Procedurally generated cyberpunk-style UI elements and animations

details.objective: Build a tool to procedurally generate cyberpunk-style UI elements for web and game interfaces
details.approach: Using CSS Grid, CSS animations, and JavaScript to create dynamically generated interfaces
details.outcomes: Created a library of reusable components and a generator tool for quick UI prototyping
details.learnings: Deepened knowledge of CSS animations and procedural design patterns

title: Audio Spectrum Analyzer
description: Real-time audio visualization with WebAudio API

details.objective: Create a real-time audio visualization tool that responds to music input
details.approach: Used WebAudio API for audio processing and HTML Canvas for rendering dynamic visualizations
details.outcomes: Built a responsive visualization that can process both uploaded files and microphone input
details.learnings: Gained experience with real-time audio processing and optimization techniques for smooth animations

title: Generative Art System
description: Algorithm-based art generation with controllable parameters

details.objective: Explore the intersection of mathematics, algorithms, and art through generative systems
details.approach: Created a framework for defining generative art algorithms with adjustable parameters
details.outcomes: Produced a series of unique digital artworks and an interactive tool for exploration
details.learnings: Deepened understanding of mathematical patterns and their application to visual art

details.objective: Build a high-performance particle physics simulation in the browser
details.approach: Using WebGL for GPU-accelerated calculations and rendering of thousands of particles
details.outcomes: Created an interactive simulation with adjustable physics parameters and visual effects
details.learnings: Gained experience with GPU programming and optimization techniques for real-time simulations

title: Smart Home Dashboard
description: IoT control interface for smart home devices

details.objective: Create a unified dashboard for controlling and monitoring smart home devices
details.approach: Built with Vue.js and integrated with MQTT for real-time communication with IoT devices
details.outcomes: Developed a responsive dashboard with customizable widgets and automation rules
details.learnings: Improved understanding of IoT protocols and real-time data visualization
